name: Mind of Paper
description: Play as a paper plane and avoid incoming blocks to avoid crumpling your plane. This game will take you back to your childhood and and help you remember all the fun you had while playing with your toys. Just be careful, controls change over time. Watch out for control error, that notifies you of the everchanging, unstable controls. Controls switch between W,A,S,D and arrows. Make sure you figure out which controls you should use before it's too late!
